Name: Night Light
About the game: ABOUT Defend against the creatures of that night! Protect yourself and your lamp by building and upgrading your base. Equip yourself with the best weapons to deal with the incoming waves. BUILD Build a base to defend your base against the incoming creatures. You get a variety of choices on what to add to your base. UPGRADE Upgrade your walls and turrets because the creatures get stronger the longer you last!
